Dear experts,
I try to create a handmade, virtual weather file for a complete year of
wonderfull clear skies. The goal is a direct-insolation study, somehow the
maximum potential for a given site. So I am interested only in direct and
diffuse irradiance values in the fake .epw.
A) Is there a nice way to create a fake .epw for an arbitrary location for
clear sky all year long? (I would head for looping through the year with
gensky, but that's brute. And the following steps, rework of my fuzzy
concept are unclear to me, today.)
B) What would you suggest for sizing down the timesteps in the epw....
dctimestep calculation (two.phase method...thx to andy' s pdf and David).
The insulation study should give data more frequently than hourly.


Many thanks,
Robert
